title: FISTOFMANIA: The Tale Of Isa Ali The Aboriginal Superhero Boxer Vol. 1
description: FISTOFMANIA is the story of Isa Ali who is an Indigenous American boxer and a wealthy landholder, philanthropist, and businessman. His main rival is Inca El, whom Isa is due to fight. But before they meet, Isa discovers there is a performance enhancement on the streets in the form of a canned drink named FISTOFMANIA.The FISTOFMANIA drink gives extraordinary punching power to those who use it and Isa goes in disguise to track down the person who is selling it. Also, during Isaâ€™s training as he prepares for his showdown with, he develops a hair kit which is designed to detect even the faintest trace of any narcotic, and which Isa and Inca will both test on the day of their fight.My name is Quincy McAdoo from Efland, North Carolina. My two main interests are my family and sports, of which my favorites are basketball and boxing. The FISTOFMANIA concept was inspired by my son's, Isa McAdoo, Ezra McAdoo, and my love for boxing.
author: Quincy McAdoo
